name: Braskem Netherlands B.V.
membership: Braskem is a Member of two trade associations: PlasticsEurope and European BioPlastics.
goal: Braskem Netherlands would like to engage with policy-makers and other interested parties in order to inform them about its business, especially in the area of bio-based products, chemicals and the circular economy. Braskem would also like to monitor any legislation which may have the potential to impact on its business. Additionally, Braskem would like to further develop its network so that it can stay up-to-date with any developments in EU and national political affairs.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Enterprise, Environment, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: The Circular Economy Package; Sustainability of biomass / Energy Union; Bioeconomy Strategy; Strategy on Plastics.
